content.rendered:
TTE Facilities Management achieves accreditation of ISO 41001:2018 Facilities Management standards.

Achieving ISO 41001:2018 is a significant milestone in TTE’s transformation journey and the recent new brand identity of TTE Facilities Management (FM). After rigorous audits of processes and site operations the certificate was issued by TÜV NORD Middle East, (Member of TÜV NORD GROUP). This is a true testament to the stringent focus on efficiency, value addition to clients, and enhancing the overall performance of TTE FM’s strong commitment to the FM industry.

The certificate was presented by Shibu Davies, Regional Head TÜV NORD, to Dilip Sharma, Executive VP – TTE and Marc Daly MCIPS, CPPM, CPP, VP – TTE FM in the presence of Swapna Upadhye, Manager – Quality & Business Excellence, Easa Saleh Al Gurg Group – Corporate Affairs and MUHAMMAD UMER,Grad IOSH,PMP®, IDipNEBOSH, Assistant Manager – QHSE, TTE.

TTE FM has always been committed to delivering exceptional facility management services that meet and exceed client expectations. The ISO 41001:2018 Facilities Management certification is part of the company’s continuous journey to service excellence.
